property.name: mainMonitorPpi
property.shortdesc: The value of the system reported main monitor resolution

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the GeneralPreference (a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: toolTips
property.shortdesc: Tool tip behavior.

property.name: greekVectorGraphicsOnDrag
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not to greek vector graphics when dragging at high quality.

property.name: showConveyor
property.shortdesc: Show the conveyor on content collector or content placer tool activation

property.name: createLinksOnContentPlace
property.shortdesc: Enable the creation of links on content place

property.name: mapStylesOnContentPlace
property.shortdesc: Enable the mapping of styles on content place

property.name: useCustomMonitorResolution
property.shortdesc: Enable the use of a custom monitor resolution in pixels per inch as opposed to querying the system settings

property.name: customMonitorPpi
property.shortdesc: When using a custom monitor resolution, what is the value of that resolution in pixels per inch

property.name: uiBrightnessPreference
property.shortdesc: Specify the Application User Interface brightness preference (from 0.0 to 1.0). To use color theme brightness preset values, specify 0.0 for Dark, 0.33 for Medium Dark, 0.67 for Medium Bright, and 1.0 for Bright. Any value between 0.0 and 1.0 can also be used.

property.name: pasteboardColorPreference
property.shortdesc: Specify the Pasteboard color preference (0 or 1). Specify 0 to set preference to Default White, and 1 to set preference to Match with Theme Color.

property.name: showContentGrabber
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not the content grabber adornment is shown.

property.name: showLiveCorners
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not the live corners grabber adornment is shown.

property.name: showMasterPageOverlay
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not to show the master page overlay when a page is selected using the Page Tool.

property.name: objectsMoveWithPage
property.shortdesc: Controls whether page items move when a page is repositioned from the UI. The option/alt key temporarily reverses this property

property.name: preventSelectingLockedItems
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not you can select and interact with a locked item. When this is off, only position is locked.

property.name: enableMultiTouchGestures
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not multi-touch gestures are enabled.

property.name: toolsPanel
property.shortdesc: Controls the appearance of the Tools panel.

property.name: autoCollapseIconPanels
property.shortdesc: If true, panel drawers close automatically.

property.name: placeCursorUsesThumbnails
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not to show thumbnails of imported files in the Place icon.

property.name: autoShowHiddenPanels
property.shortdesc: If true, vertical reveal strips appear when palette UI is hidden.

property.name: useApplicationFrame
property.shortdesc: If true, application lives in a frame.

property.name: applicationBarShown
property.shortdesc: If true, application bar is shown.

property.name: openDocumentsAsTabs
property.shortdesc: If true, documents open as tabs.

property.name: enableFloatingWindowDocking
property.shortdesc: If true, floating windows can be docked by user as tabs.

property.name: openRecentLength
property.shortdesc: Number of items to show in the Open Recent menu list. Range: 0 to 30

property.name: showTransformationValues
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not to dynamically display transformation information as part of the cursor while manipulating page items.

property.name: showAnchorObjectAdornment
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not the anchor object adornment is shown.

property.name: highlightObjectUnderSelectionTool
property.shortdesc: Controls whether or not to highlight object under selection tool.

property.name: previewPages
property.shortdesc: The pages to create preview images for. Note: Valid when include preview is true.

property.name: temporaryFolder
property.shortdesc: The location in which to store temporary files.

property.name: pageNumbering
property.shortdesc: The page numbering method.

property.name: completeFontDownloadGlyphLimit
property.shortdesc: The threshold at which to trigger font subsetting based on the number of glyphs the font contains.

property.name: includePreview
property.shortdesc: If true, includes a preview in saved documents.

property.name: previewSize
property.shortdesc: The preview size. Note: Valid when include preview is true.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GeneralPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
